DOC.criteria: Diagnosis fibromyalgia define 1990 American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criteria Visual analog pain score 40 90 mm Righthand dominance Suicidal risk Substance Abuse Pulmonary dysfunction Renal impairment Active cardiac disease Autoimmune disease Uncontrolled narrowangle glaucoma Active liver disease Cancer Active peptic ulcer disease history inflammatory bowel disease celiac sprue Unstable endocrine disease Prostatic enlargement
